headline: Deutsche Bank Analyst Skeptical about Union Pacific Corporation (UNP)’s Share Performance
summary: Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Seth Klarman. As of December 12, the average price target for UNP suggests an upside of 9%; however, the Street high indicates an upside of 22%. As of the third quarter of 2025, billionaire Seth Klarman held nearly 1.5 million units […]

headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Oil Snaps Back
summary: Oil bounces after Trump's blockade of sanctioned tankers off Venezuela. Affirm CFO says consumer 'feels quite healthy'. Rail unions sound alarm on $85B Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger.

raw.headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Oil Snaps Back
raw.summary: Oil bounces after Trump's blockade of sanctioned tankers off Venezuela. Affirm CFO says consumer 'feels quite healthy'. Rail unions sound alarm on $85B Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger.

headline: 2 big rail unions oppose $85B Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger over safety and cost concerns
summary: The proposed $85 billion merger of Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern railroads has lost the support of two unions that represent more than half their workers over concerns it will jeopardize safety and jobs, raise shipping rates and consumer prices, and cause significant disruptions.  The Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers and Trainmen and the Brotherhood of Maintenance of Way Employes Division are among the most prominent critics of the deal to create the nation's first transcontinental railroad.  When they officially announce their decision Wednesday, they will join the American Chemistry Council, an assortment of agricultural groups and competing railroad BNSF in raising concerns the merger would hurt competition.

raw.headline: 2 big rail unions oppose $85B Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger over safety and cost concerns

When they officially announce their decision Wednesday, they will join the American Chemistry Council, an assortment of agricultural groups and competing railroad BNSF in raising concerns the merger would hurt competition.
